abstract_summ: The tenth outbreak of Ebola virus disease (EVD) in North Kivu, the Democratic Republic of the Congo (DRC), was declared 8 days after the end of the ninth EVD outbreak, in the Equateur Province on August 1, 2018 . The novel coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) epidemic has spread from China to 25 countries . No African country has reported cases yet .
